verbs.description: [ARG0: French President Emmanuel Macron] [V: made] [ARG1: clear] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [C-ARG1: that his arm - over - the - shoulder bromance with President Trump has limits , using an address before a joint session of Congress to subtly repudiate Trump on climate change , Syria , global trade and the Iran deal] .

French President Emmanuel Macron made clear Wednesday that his arm - over - the - shoulder bromance with President Trump [V: has] limits , using an address before a joint session of Congress to subtly repudiate Trump on climate change , Syria , global trade and the Iran deal .

[ARG0: French President Emmanuel Macron] made clear Wednesday that his arm - over - the - shoulder bromance with President Trump has limits , [V: using] [ARG1: an address before a joint session of Congress] [ARG2: to subtly repudiate Trump on climate change , Syria , global trade and the Iran deal] .

French President Emmanuel Macron made clear Wednesday that his arm - over - the - shoulder bromance with President Trump has limits , using an address before a joint session of Congress to [ARGM-MNR: subtly] [V: repudiate] [ARG1: Trump on climate change , Syria , global trade and the Iran deal] .
